typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

clusterType.description: Gets or sets the flavor for the HDInsight cluster.

hiveCustomLibrariesContainer.description: The name of the blob container that contains custom jar files for HIVE consumption.

coreConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for core configuration.

hBaseConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for HBase configuration.

hdfsConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for Hdfs configuration.

hiveConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for HIVE configuration.

mapReduceConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for mapreduce configuration.

oozieConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for oozie configuration.

stormConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for Storm configuration.

sparkConfiguration.description: The Spark service configuration of this HDInsight cluster.

yarnConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for YARN configuration.

additionalLinkedServiceNames.description: Specify additional Azure storage accounts that need to be accessible from the cluster.

hcatalogLinkedServiceName.description: The name of Azure SQL linked service that point to the HCatalog database.

schemaGeneration.description: Define what options to use for generating/altering table for an input and output tables for an HDInsight activity.

dataNodeSize.description: Gets or sets the size of the Data Node.

headNodeSize.description: Gets or sets the size of the Head Node.

zookeeperNodeSize.description: Gets or sets the size of the Zookeeper Node.

osType.description: Gets or sets the type of operating system installed on cluster nodes.

sshPublicKey.description: Gets or sets the public key to be used for SSH.

sshUserName.description: Gets or sets SSH user name.

azureDataLakeStoreLinkedService.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureDataLakeStoreLinkedService
azureDataLakeStoreLinkedService.description: Azure Data Lake Store linked service.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

authorization.description: OAuth authorization that may be used by ADF to access resources on your behalf. Each authorization is unique and may only be used once.

sessionId.description: OAuth session ID from the oauth authorization session. Each session id is unique and may only be used once.

servicePrincipalId.description: The ID of the application used to authenticate against the Azure Data Lake Store account.

servicePrincipalKey.description: The Key of the application used to authenticate against the Azure Data Lake Store account.

tenant.description: The name or ID of the tenant to which the service principal belongs.

subscriptionId.description: Data Lake Store account subscription ID (if different from Data Factory account).

resourceGroupName.description: Data Lake Store account resource group name (if different from Data Factory account).

host.description: One or more IP addresses or host names of the Cassandra server. Specify a comma-separated list of IP addresses and/or host names if attempting to connect to multiple servers. Each server is a replica.

port.description: The TCP port number that the Cassandra server uses to listen for client connections. The default value is 9042.

authenticationType.description: The authentication type to be used to connect to the Cassandra database. Must be Basic or Anonymous.

encryptedCredential.description: The encrypted credential for Basic authentication.

server.description: The IP address or server name of the MongoDB server.

port.description: The TCP port number that the MongoDB server uses to listen for client connections. The default value is 27017.

authenticationType.description: The authentication type to be used to connect to the MongoDB database. Must be Basic or Anonymous.

authSource.description: The name of the MongoDB database that you want to use to check your credentials for authentication.

databaseName.description: The name of the MongoDB database that you want to access.

encryptedCredential.description: The encrypted credential for Basic authentication.

azureDataLakeAnalyticsLinkedService.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureDataLakeAnalyticsLinkedService
azureDataLakeAnalyticsLinkedService.description: Azure Data Lake Analytics linked service.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

authorization.description: OAuth authorization that may be used by ADF to access resources on your behalf. Each authorization is unique and may only be used once.

sessionId.description: OAuth session ID from the oauth authorization session. Each session id is unique and may only be used once.

subscriptionId.description: Data Lake Analytics account subscription ID (if different from Data Factory account).

resourceGroupName.description: Data Lake Analytics account resource group name (if different from Data Factory account).

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

url.description: The URL of the web service endpoint, e.g. http://www.microsoft.com.

authenticationType.description: Type of authentication used to connect to the web table source. Possible values are: Anonymous and Basic.

apiKey.description: Deprecated. WebApi-based authentication is no longer supported.

httpLinkedService.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.HttpLinkedService
httpLinkedService.description: Linked service for an HTTP source.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

url.description: The base URL of the HTTP endpoint, e.g. http://www.microsoft.com.

authenticationType.description: The authentication type to be used to connect to the HTTP server.

username.description: User name for Basic, Digest, or Windows authentication.

password.description: Password for Basic, Digest, Windows, or ClientCertificate with EmbeddedCertData authentication.

embeddedCertData.description: Base64 encoded certificate data for ClientCertificate authentication. For on-premises copy with ClientCertificate authentication, either CertThumbprint or EmbeddedCertData/Password should be specified.

certThumbprint.description: Thumbprint of certificate for ClientCertificate authentication. Only valid for on-premises copy. For on-premises copy with ClientCertificate authentication, either CertThumbprint or EmbeddedCertData/Password should be specified.

encryptedCredential.description: The encrypted credential for Basic, Digest, Windows or ClientCertificate authentication.

enableServerCertificateValidation.description: If true, validate the HTTPS server SSL certificate. Default value is true.

hdfsLinkedService.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.HdfsLinkedService
hdfsLinkedService.description: Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) Linked Service.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

url.description: The URL of the HDFS service endpoint, e.g. http://myhostname:50070/webhdfs/v1.

authenticationType.description: Type of authentication used to connect to the HDFS. Possible values are: Anonymous, and Windows.

encryptedCredential.description: The encrypted credential for Windows authentication.

onPremisesOdbcLinkedService.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.OnPremisesOdbcLinkedService
onPremisesOdbcLinkedService.description: On-premises Open Database Connectivity (ODBC) Linked Service.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

authenticationType.description: Type of authentication used to connect to the ODBC data store. Possible values are: Anonymous and Basic.

connectionString.description: The non-access credential portion of the connection string as well as an optional encrypted credential.

credential.description: The access credential portion of the connection string specified in driver-specific property-value format.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

url.description: The URL of the OData service endpoint.

authenticationType.description: Type of authentication used to connect to the OData service.

username.description: User name of the OData service.

gatewayName.description: The on-premises gateway name for Windows authentication.

encryptedCredential.description: The encrypted credential for Windows authentication.

authorizedCredential.description: The OAuth authorized credential that may be used by ADF to access resources on your behalf. Each authorization is unique and may only be used once.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

username.description: The username for Basic authentication of the Salesforce source.

password.description: The password for Basic authentication of the Salesforce source.

securityToken.description: The security token is required to access Salesforce.

environmentUrl.description: The Salesforce login URL. To connect to the Salesforce sandbox environment, use 'test.salesforce.com'.

awsAccessKeyLinkedService.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AwsAccessKeyLinkedService
awsAccessKeyLinkedService.description: An access key-based Amazon Web Services (AWS) linked service.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

amazonRedshiftLinkedService.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AmazonRedshiftLinkedService
amazonRedshiftLinkedService.description: Linked Service for Amazon Redshift connector.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

server.description: The name of the Amazon Redshift server.

port.description: The TCP port number that the Amazon Redshift server uses to listen for client connections.

username.description: The username of the Amazon Redshift server.

password.description: The password of the Amazon Redshift server.

database.description: The database name of the Amazon Redshift server.

host.description: Host name of the FTP server.

port.description: The TCP port number that the FTP server uses to listen for client connections. Default value is 21.

authenticationType.description: The authentication type to be used to connect to the FTP server.

username.description: Username to logon the FTP server.

password.description: Password to logon the FTP server.

encryptedCredential.description: The encrypted credential for Basic authentication.

enableSsl.description: If true, connect to the FTP server over SSL/TLS channel. Default value is true.

enableServerCertificateValidation.description: If true, validate the FTP server SSL certificate when connect over SSL/TLS channel. Default value is true.

sftpLinkedService.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.SftpLinkedService
sftpLinkedService.description: A linked service for an SSH File Transfer Protocol (SFTP) server.

port.description: The TCP port number that the SFTP server uses to listen for client connections.

authenticationType.description: The authentication type to be used to connect to the SFTP server.

username.description: The username used to log on to the SFTP server.

password.description: Password to logon the SFTP server for Basic authentication.

privateKeyPath.description: The SSH private key file path for SshPublicKey authentication. Only valid for on-premises copy. For on-premises copy with SshPublicKey authentication, either PrivateKeyPath or PrivateKeyContent should be specified. SSH private key should be OpenSSH format.

privateKeyContent.description: Base64 encoded SSH private key content for SshPublicKey authentication. For on-premises copy with SshPublicKey authentication, either PrivateKeyPath or PrivateKeyContent should be specified. SSH private key should be OpenSSH format.

passPhrase.description: The password to decrypt the SSH private key if the SSH private key is encrypted.

skipHostKeyValidation.description: If true, skip the SSH host key validation. Default value is false.

hostKeyFingerprint.description: The host key finger-print of the SFTP server. When SkipHostKeyValidation is false, HostKeyFingerprint should be specified.

encryptedCredential.description: The encrypted credential for Basic or SshPublicKey authentication.
